video_prompt: **Camera slowly moves forward, revealing serene underwater realm. Gentle ripples disturb the soft seabed. Small fish dart across the background. Tiny bubbles drift upwards. Subtle light shifts and shimmers across swaying coral and the resting mollusk shell.**
image_prompt: Hyperrealistic illustration of a whimsical enchanted underwater world: an adorable baby nestled peacefully in a cozy, cream-colored, fuzzy clam shell on a sandy seabed. Soft, diffused sunlight illuminates colorful coral, marine flora, scattered pearls, and subtle swimming fish in the blurred blue-green ocean background. Tranquil and wondrous.
refined_video_prompt: Forward camera movement unveils evolving underwater scenes. Gentle ripples disturb the seabed. Small fish dart across the background. Tiny bubbles drift upwards. Subtle light shifts and shimmers across swaying coral.
